sourcesContent: import React from"react";import{Text as TextIcon}from"@scaleflex/icons/text";import ToolsBarItemButton from"../../ToolsBar/ToolsBarItemButton";import{TOOLS_IDS}from"../../../utils/constants";var TextButton=function(a){var b=a.selectTool,c=a.isSelected,d=a.t;return React.createElement(ToolsBarItemButton,{className:"FIE_text-tool-button",id:TOOLS_IDS.TEXT,label:d("textTool"),Icon:TextIcon,onClick:b,isSelected:c})};TextButton.defaultProps={isSelected:!1};export default TextButton;
